m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Blockchain-Based Peer-To-Peer Solar Energy Trading To Be Trialed In Perth August 13th, 2016 by Guest Contributor Â  Originally published on RenewEconomy . By Sophie Vorrath A Perth start-up is set to begin trials of its blockchain-based software program that, if successful, could mean the beginning of peer-to-peer energy trading in Australia, in which consumers buy, sell or swap excess solar electricity directly with each other, rather than to the grid for a minimal return.
